WELCOME.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WELCOME.content: Hello {{you}}! You have been added to Catena-X. The community welcomes you and is looking forward to your contributions.

WELCOME_SERVICE_PROVIDER.title: Service Providers are waiting for you

WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.title: Register a Connector
WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.content: You do not have any registered Connector so far. Have a look at the connector offers and get your connector to participate.

WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.title: Check out the App Marketplace
WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.content: Get a first insight into available apps, just follow us to the marketplace for apps.

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.title: Request for app subscription
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.content: <0>{{user}}</0> likes to subscribe for app <1>{{app}}</1>. Please take the time and review their request.

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.title: App request activated
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.content: Your subscription for {{app}} is now active

CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.title: Connector registered successfully
CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.content: The connector {{connector}} was successfully created and you can assign users now.

WelcomeInvite.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WelcomeInvite.content: Hello {{you}}! Your company is now officially registered to the network and you can start your technical onboarding journey now.

WelcomeUser.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WelcomeUser.content: Hello {{you}}! You have been added to Catena-X. The community welcomes you and is looking forward to your contributions.

WelcomeAppMarketplace.title: Check out the App Marketplace
WelcomeAppMarketplace.content: Get a first insight into available apps, just follow us to the marketplace for apps.

NoConnector.title: No connector registered
NoConnector.content: You do not have any registered Connector so far. Have a look at the connector offers and get your connector to participate.

ConnectorRegistered.title: Connector registered successfully
ConnectorRegistered.content: The connector {{connector}} was successfully created and you can assign users now.

NoUseCase.title: Select Use Cases
NoUseCase.content: Pick your preferred use cases to customize the network to you needs.

AppRequestSubmitted.title: App request submitted
AppRequestSubmitted.content: Hey {{you}}, thanks for your request to approve app {{app}}. We will let you know when it got processed.

AppRequestApproved.title: App request approved
AppRequestApproved.content: Your request for app {{app}} was successfully approved. You can now start to assign user permissions via the user management panel.

AppRequestRejeced.title: App request rejected
AppRequestRejeced.content: Your request for app {{app}} got declined. Please contact {{user}} for questions.

AppTermsChange.title: Changed terms and conditions
AppTermsChange.content: App {{app}} is about to change its terms and conditions till end of the month. Please have a look at the updated T&Cs. There is no agreement needed. If you don't cancel the app usage contract till {{date}} the new terms and conditions will automatically apply.

AppSubscriptionSubmitted.title: App subscription submitted
AppSubscriptionSubmitted.content: Hey {{you}}, your request for subscription to app {{app}} was successful.

AppSubscriptionReceived.title: Request for app subscription
AppSubscriptionReceived.content: Hey {{you}}, {{user}} is interested to subscribe for app {{app}} and writes:
